name: Robot Commander
description:
Online real-time strategy shooter with the clearness of a classical board game Check out the BETA version now featuring strong and diverse AI

Robot Commander is a multiplayer real-time strategy and tactics shooter with the clearness of a classical board game. The emphasis lies on controlling a growing number of characters simultaneously.

You guide a team of robots through a maze-like battle arena. Try to gain control over all enemy robots fast or they will get you!

Up to 8 players control up to 250 robots in a single arena game. Come up with new ideas and outwit your opponents. Try your skills online against other players or practice with a very strong artificial intelligence. The progress of your playing strength is measured using the ELO rating system.
